name: Shazam!
description: Shazam! is a movie starring Zachary Levi, Mark Strong, and Asher Angel. We all have a superhero inside us, it just takes a bit of magic to bring it out. In Billy Batson's case, by shouting out one word - SHAZAM. - this streetwise...
keywords: one word title,exclamation in title,origin of hero,shared universe,captain marvel a.k.a. shazam character
